archimate:ApplicationProcess.name: Data Hierachy Merge
archimate:ApplicationProcess.documentation:
All contributing time series are ordered in to a hierachy based on deemed accuracy. E.g. for Rainfall this is: Observed, Radar, NowCast, SR, MR,0 Processing takes each time step and finds the highest ranked valid value and outputs a single time series.
Within the Create Upstream Forecast Process this will be applied to groups of upstream forecasts which refer to the same forecast point. (e.g. an FMP as level 1 and a lower confidence PDM for the same point incase the FMP model fails).
